Summary: Was looking at a jet with small con trail. A object another jet I thought was heading right at it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Avondale
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details i was working at avondale shipyard and myself and a friend were standing outside on a break. the weather was clear light blue sky, you could see forever. we were talking about the job and we notice a jet way up about 20,00ft. heading south\east, you could tell it was a jet. from the opposite direction we notice what we thought was another jet heading right at it. they were about 5 miles apart when we first saw them. it looked like they were going about the same speed. when they got about the length of 10 jets apart the second jet made a 45 degree turn to the right and shot out of site. we both looked at each other and new right away it was a ufo. the turning object had to be going 3-times the speed after the turn. after that day i new for sure that they are real ufos.
